content: *easy crochet stitches make great texture and contrasting colors add interest to a simple silhouette comprised of rectangles berroco * from berroco booklet #272 skill level easy finished measurements bust 32 36-40-44-48-52 length 19 19-19½-20-20½-21 materials berroco vintage dk 100 grs 1 hank #2156 cork a 2 hanks #2192 chana dal b 2 2-2-3-3-3 hanks #2194 breezeway c and 2 2-2-3-3-3 hanks #2179 chocolate d originally shown in berroco lumina 25 grs 1 1-2-2-2-2 hanks #1620 gold coast a berroco seduce 40 grs 3 3-4-4-5-5 hanks #4435 chana dal b 4 5-5-6-6-7 hanks #4448 verdigris c and 4 4-5-6-6-7 hanks #4436 rye d crochet hook size 4 50 mm g or size to obtain gauge gauge 12 half_double_crochet s and 10 chain-1 spaces = 4 13 row = 4 in pat st
